Name: VRでレムと異世界生活-膝枕&添寝編
About the game: VR compatible! The app allows you to enter the world of 'Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World.' ※This app is a one-time purchase. No in-game purchases are required to enjoy the game in full. All-new recordings by Rem's voice actress, Iori Minase! -Play Modes *'Lap pillow' mode: Rest your head on Rem's lap as she gently eases you into sleep. *'Lying together' mode: Rem lies down next to you as she gently eases you into sleep. *'View' mode: Enjoy a 360-degree view of Rem's 1:1 scale VR model from any angle you desire.
